recipe.title: Raspberry Shrub
instructions: Stir 3 tablespoons Simple Syrup, 2 tablespoons Raspberry Vinegar, and 1 tablespoon brandy (optional) in a 12-ounce glass. Fill glass halfway with ice. Fill glass with sparkling water or Prosecco. Garnish with a lemon slice and a mint sprig.
